content: As a follow-up to this discussion, should we make it possible to get the permanent link to a message via right-clicking on the timestamp, because that's probably familiar to a lot of folks from Twitter and GitHub having that model?

I'm not sure if we'd want to remove the existing "copy link to message" actions menu item when doing so -- it might be too subtle -- but adding that additional way to get at it feels reasonable to me.
I'd definitely appreciate that. I occasionally actually try to do that.
